subject: Football
Deaths (Obituaries)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Mr. Pardee endured the brutal conditions of Bear Bryant’s “Junction Boys” training camp at Texas A&M and went on to become an All-Pro linebacker and N.F.L. coach.
snippet: Mr. Pardee endured the brutal conditions of Bear Bryant’s “Junction Boys” training camp at Texas A&M and went on to become an All-Pro linebacker and N.F.L. coach.
